name: Criminal Library
description:
--Welcome to Criminal Library--

You and you'r band are trying to play music in the library, but the old lady gets very mad and wants to fight!

Will you be able to defeat the old lady and keep on making music?

For the best experience play in full screen mode so  you can see the full game.

--Controls-

Use WASD or the ARROWS keys to move.

Use Z or Enter to interact.

--BulletHell Jam 2022--

This game was made in 10 days for the BulletHell Jam 2022

Programming, Art, Music, SFX was made by me the font I used was made by Philippe Moesch.
